subject: Golf
PGA Championship
lead_paragraph: Phil Mickelson shot an eight-under-par 64 on Saturday, on the same course he was denied from playing 21 years ago, to move into a tie for the lead with Vijay Singh at the BMW Championship.
snippet: Phil Mickelson shot an eight-under-par 64 on Saturday, on the same course he was denied from playing 21 years ago, to move into a tie for the lead with Vijay Singh at the BMW Championship.
